title: Talkmore Campaign
description: Designed the campaign website and campaign material for Talkmore's affiliate campaign at Adservice.
challenge: Adservice is an affiliate company that connects advertisers and publishers. Talkmore was one of our advertisers which wanted to generate more leads through our gamification concept "LeadPlatform".
solution: A campaign website and campaign material were designed resulting in 15.000+ visitiors and and a 18%+ conversion rate.
